chunk_metadata.created_by: Enhanced Markdown Chunker with Comprehensive Context

works.Name: Vier Lieder
works.Notes: 165th birthday edition; for soprano and chamber orchestra
works.Long Description: Four songs for voice and chamber orchestra, including movements "Immer wieder", "O Nacht", "Schiffe, die Nachts sich begegnen", and "Musikalischer Eindruck".
works.Short Description: Four Romantic songs for soprano and chamber orchestra.

works.Name: Das goldene Schlüsselchen
works.Notes: 70th birthday edition 2024; after Tolstoy's fairy-tale; Soviet fairy-tale film inspiration
works.Long Description: A musical retelling of Tolstoy's "The Golden Key or The Adventures of Burattino" for narrator and orchestra, with movements including Preludio, Papa Carlo, Buratino, Theater, Piero, Karabas Barabas, Der Kater Basilio und die Füchsin Alisa Malwina, Pudel Artemon, Schildkröte Tortila, and Piero Duremar.
works.Short Description: Contemporary fairy-tale music for narrator and orchestra based on Tolstoy's story.

works.Name: Was ist das - Leben?
works.Notes: Text by Andreas Jungwirth; bird's perspective on human life
works.Long Description: A contemporary oratorio for narrator and orchestra exploring various human life situations from the perspective of a bird, based on text by Andreas Jungwirth.
works.Short Description: Contemporary orchestral work reflecting on human life from a bird's viewpoint.

works.Name: Oratorio pour une femme seule: Simone Weil
works.Notes: Commissioned by Radio France and Orchestre National de l'Île de France; text by Emmanuel Bourdieu; 60th birthday edition 2022
works.Long Description: A multilingual oratorio (French, German, English) for narrator and orchestra based on text by Emmanuel Bourdieu, commissioned to commemorate the life of philosopher Simone Weil through six significant years.
works.Short Description: Contemporary oratorio about philosopher Simone Weil for narrator and orchestra.

works.Name: Ouvertüre aus Erwin und Elmire
works.Notes: From Goethe's Singspiel; manuscript facsimile from Anna Amalia Bibliothek Weimar; 165th birthday edition 2022
works.Long Description: Overture from Goethe's Singspiel "Erwin und Elmire" composed by Anna Amalia in 1776, demonstrating remarkable professionalism in instrumental treatment and musical composition, blending opera seria, opera buffa, and folk song elements.
works.Short Description: Classical overture from Goethe's Singspiel composed by Duchess Anna Amalia.

works.Name: Ostinato super Thema Octoïcha
works.Notes: 115th birthday edition 2024; technically simple but musically demanding
works.Long Description: A 20th-century work for piano, harp and string orchestra based on Octoïcha themes, noted for its technical simplicity combined with musical sophistication and renunciation of romantic expressiveness.
works.Short Description: Modern chamber orchestra work featuring piano, harp and strings.

works.Name: Secret of the Seven Stars
works.Notes: 70th birthday edition 2023; 10th piece in Voices in Time cycle; inspired by Chinese philosophy and guqin music
works.Long Description: The tenth piece in the Voices in Time cycle for various ensembles, reflecting on classical Chinese literature, poetry, legends, and guqin music, representing a dynasty in the cycle's exploration of cultural voices.
works.Short Description: Contemporary chamber work inspired by Chinese culture and philosophy.

chunk_info.processing_notes: Extracted 7 complete works with sufficient detail including name, composer, and instrumentation. All works are orchestral or chamber orchestra pieces, with several featuring narrator parts. Anniversary editions prominently noted.
